main.name: Rob Quinn
main.occupation: Pega Certified Senior System Architect (CSSA) - Full Stack Developer
main.description: Experienced Application Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the insurance industry. Skilled in Pega PRPC, Full Stack Web Development (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Java, Bootstrap, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, SQL), Moble Development, and Test Automation.
main.bio: Pega Certified Senior Architect (CSSA) working at Genworth Financial as an Application Developer. Strong background in QA Testing, Test Automation and Automation Frameworks using Selenium.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Learned and applied HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Java, Bootstrap, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Database Theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Command Line, Git, and more.
Majored in Rhetoric and Communication Studies and minored in Business Adminstration

work.title: Application Developer/Pega Senior System Archtect
work.description: Obtained Pega System Achitect (CSA) and Pega Senior System Architect (CSSA) certifications. Develop all aspects of our Customer Service Workflow Applicaiton. Prepared major release files and documentation. Build Soap and Rest service connectors. Configure complex UI requirements. Create case types and flows. Mentored new hire. Supported contractors in troubleshooting application products.

work.title: QA Test Analyst, QA Lead
work.description: Oversee onshore and offshore QA resources. Review all test cases written by team members prior to execution. Determine scope and approach for regression automation test bed. Write and execute automated scripts using HP UFT and Selenium to create test data, as well as, for regression testing. Partner with COE to execute Performance Testing. Create and execute functional test cases. Write and execute select, insert, update, and delete SQL statements to create and modify test data using Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio and Oracle SQL Developer.
